caption: A gentle breeze carries the smoke from a crackling campfire across an open field. The flames flicker and dance, casting a warm glow against the dimming sky. As the smoke swirls upward, it gradually disperses into the evening air, creating a soft, ethereal haze. The surrounding landscape is calm and serene, with the silhouettes of distant trees standing quietly against the horizon.
